author: Janet Hook
title: GOP Loses Establishment Voice as Paul Ryan Steps Down
text:
Speaker Paul Ryanâ€™s retirement from the House will sideline one of the most influential leaders championing traditional Republican-establishment policies, such as free trade, lower federal deficits and an overhaul of safety-net programs.
The departure of Mr. Ryan is an emblem of how the Republican Party is being remade by President Donald Trump, who has upended decades of party orthodoxy by pushing tariffs and demanding big boosts in spending, particularly on defense, which contributed to the federal deficit growing.
...
